replies.body:
WillovJ's art:
Teemo: HELP!  I DON'T WANNA DIE!
Braum: Ward not worth dying over, but okay.
Enemy team: CHARGE!

~~Boltstyke'~~ **Chewbert** art:

{{champion:86}} "NOOO! KATARINA!"

{{champion:17}} "Garen stop it. Kayle is about to kill us."

{{champion:86}} "I can't live on without her."

{{champion:17}} "She's not dead."

{{champion:86}} "Huh?"

{{champion:17}} "She'll back in a few seconds. Geez"

{{champion:86}} "Really?"

{{champion:17}} "Yeah."

{{champion:86}} "I will protect her. I will not let her die agai-"

{{champion:17}} "Garen, I killed her."

{{champion:86}} "Wha-"

{{champion:17}} "She isn't on our team."

{{champion:10}} "Don't worry, Katarina, your death will not be vain."
I didnt thought about this when I was painting this, but certainly made it seem much more interesting. i love this! XD

I struggled to find the ward on your drawing xD
Stupid Teemo was in the way. Good work thou
{{champion:55}} "Garen I hate you, you stalk me."
lol so hard at "she isnt on our team"
aww good guy {{champion:201}}  even helps {{champion:17}} <3 my love for him grew 10 times stronger would have been more but he helped teemo well he tried
in headcrabes art, {{champion:17}}  got smashed by a {{champion:51}}  trap.... died laughing
The best part is he still has the cupcake in his cold, dead hands.
worth.
Oh lol thx for mentioning that. I couldn't see the trap on {{champion:17}} But I did see his hat so I was confused what was going on over there
Yordles just can't resist the cupcakes.
Bittersweet Lulu Polymorphs champions into cupcakes. Caitlyn uses cupcakes in her Yordle Snap-traps, which Yordles can not resist. *Coincidence?*
When you try to draw one...but then realize that you can't draw. {{item:3070}}

HEY DIGAAG WA RIZ I SEE YOU! I SEE YOU COMP SCI MAJOR. YOU CAN'T HIDE YOUR LOOP BASED HUMOR FROM ME!
Two of these winners did not meet all the entry requirements, and yet Riot wonders why they always have such a problem getting players to obey the rules...
Which two, because as I see it, all of them do.
I can't find a ward on the Draven one, and I remember that was a requirement. Dunno about the other one.
The third Draven is the ward, in the bottom right.
oh, cool.

One of the stipulations was that they be engaged in combat, either together or against each other.  Lulu and Gnar are comically playing with Rengar like a doll, there is no combat going on between anyone in that scene; same goes with the Zyra and Nami vignette.
Its a {{item:2043}} in ChaoFunPie's drawing. So {{champion:107}} ulted, got polymorphed by {{champion:117}} and taken out by {{champion:150}} , atleast that's how I sees it. :3
In the Nami/Zyra one if you've ever played support fighting over a pink ward either defending or trying to kill it is quite a task.
Except that Lulu polymorphed Rengar.

Exactly.
***"Your entry must depict two or more champions in the midst of battle."***
Lulu and Gnar are not in battle. Neither are Zyra and Nami.

Zyra and Nami looks like a play on *The Creation of Man*. 

The Draven piece only has one champion, technically.
{{champion:119}} IS BATTLE! {{champion:119}} IS LIFE!! {{champion:119}} IS LOVE!!! {{champion:119}} IS ALL!!!!
I think Rito should make 10 winners for hand drawn art and 10 winners for digital art(unless specifically stated) in upcoming contest otherwise hand drawn pieces have no chance.
mine was hand drawn too. Didn't stand a chance against these digital pieces..... sad day.
you start with handdrawimg then you scan it. and then use photoshop.
Unfortunately not every artist has that type of equipment at their disposal.

I definitely tried to point this out when I saw the contest announcement.  It's also been rather obvious that the digital world is literally making hand drawn anything look obsolete as hell.  It's like comparing a top of the line laptop from today with the world's first super computer.  I think a lot of people see it like that anyway.  And what gets picked?  The shiny-looking thing that makes prettier noises and pictures.  I thought I had an idea that would have captured Riot's attention a little, but that proved a little wrong.  :/

I wanted to join but apparently they underestimate creative people under the age 18. :/
...
It's because of contest law. It wasn't Riot's decision.
Is there a way to look at all the submissions? I want to take a look at all the art other people posted. I was also disappointed I didn't get into the top 10 but congratz on all the winners!
Would like to see ALL artwork submitted.
Can we see the ones that didn't win?
HEY RIOT, WHEN AM I GONNA BE ABLE TO CHANGE MY WARD SKIN IN CHAMPION SELECT?

"Your entry must depict two or more champions in the midst of battle: you can show them dueling to their last breath, joining forces to slaughter a sinister foe, or teaming up to take down a monstrous objective"
how did the draven artwork won this?

I followed all the guidelines in my entry. A Draven, and another Draven can definitely count as two separate champions, considering that it's possible that opposing teams can have a player, play as the same character against each other in battle. 

Also, many people were like "THERE'S NO WARD", but a Draven ward exists- though I didn't know about that particular ward skin until after the contest, lol.
yeah when i saw yours i was like there is no ward then some one said the 3rd one is a ward i was like ohhh yeah draven ward herpa derr lol. that was an awesome idea you did
I have to agree on this. It is amazing artwork don't get me wrong and some might say it is the LEAGUE OF {{champion:119}}  but in all fairness to the other entries, this one did not follow the rules.
{{champion:119}} ward
riot i hope your doing another one next year cause i just got Photoshop so i dint really have a chance this year.
I love the {{champion:86}} one just Cause Of Two BIG things >_< {{champion:55}}
Oh god, the Draven one. My sides. {{item:3070}}
